data.scheme_name: Maharashtra State Export Promotion Policy 2023 - MSME Participation in International Exhibition - General Category - Male, Others - New
data.benefits: The scheme provides up to Rs. 3 lakhs or 50% reimbursement for MSMEs participating in international exhibitions, limited to two visits per policy period.
data.eligibility: The MSME participating in exhibitions promoted by Govt. of India, State Government, EPCs and other reputed organizations shall be eligible under the scheme.
data.beneficiaries: The MSME participating in exhibitions promoted by Govt. of India, State Government, EPCs and other reputed organizations shall be eligible under the scheme.
data.nodal_agency: Maharashtra Industry, Trade and Investment Facilitation Cell (MAITRI)
data.context: The Maharashtra State Export Promotion Policy 2023 introduced to develop every district  as an Export hub for balanced regional growth.
data.objective: The Maharashtra Export Promotion Policy 2023 aims to double the stateâ€™s exports to $150 billion by 2030, attract $3.4 billion in FDI, create 40,000 jobs, and develop 30 export-oriented infrastructure projects.
data.description:
The scheme provides up to Rs. 3 lakhs or 75% reimbursement for MSMEs participating in international exhibitions, limited to two visits per policy period.

 Eligible MSMEs can avail this benefit for a maximum of two visits during the policy period, with one visit allowed per year.
data.funding_facilitator: Maharashtra Industry, Trade and Investment Facilitation Cell (MAITRI)
data.funding_mechanism: Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority after fulfilment of condition
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (If MSME)
Certificate of Incorporation
Business Details
Detailed Project Report
KYC Documents
Export Details 
Any other documents as required
data.checklist_info_d:
MAITRI 
Krupanidhi Building, 9, Walchand Hirachand Marg, Ballard Estate, Fort, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400038
Email - maitri-mh@gov.in
data.beneficiary: Specified Industries - All Entities - Maharashtra - All MSMEs
